subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
 I am sorry for sending this unsolicited proposal to you. I believe
that the internet is a global village where you meet people for
business and coupled with the fact that the nature of this project
needs a foreign business partner.
Before I proceed   I am Abdulaziz Alkuwari, I worked in the contract
and project department of Qatar petroleum Doha,  I have an investment
opportunity of $75M for investment in your country either in real
estate.or n any profitable venture of your choice
 I need your assistance and cooperation to move this fund into your
account as a contract payment with QP for onward investment in your
country.
If you are ready and serious to work with me, I will send to you the
full detailed information of this project for you to read before we
will sign a MOU agreement.  if you can't ,don't let this be known by
any other person. it's between you and me.
Looking forward to hear from you.
Thanks,
Yours Faithfully in Islam
Abdulaziz Alkuwari
Email: 
abdukuwari002@gmail.com

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Abdulaziz Alkuwari,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this proposal. It's quite interesting to hear about your investment plans in my country. I'm always open to new opportunities and ideas.

Could you please provide more details about the project? What kind of venture are we talking about here? And how exactly would I be assisting you?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Michael
